thread.title: Man, 30, knifed by assailant during brawl in NYC subway station
thread.title_full: Man, 30, knifed by assailant during brawl in NYC subway station - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Man, 30, knifed by assailant during brawl in NYC subway station
text:
A man was stabbed inside a subway station in Harlem Friday afternoon, police said.
The 30-year-old victim was fighting with a man when he was knifed inside the on the No.1 line’s 145th St. station at 4:30 p.m., cops said.
Medics took the victim to Harlem Hospital with non-life-threatening injuries, police said.
Police are looking for a suspect.
Bronx man admits he fatally stabbed tenant in front of vic’s kid 
The No. 1 train was bypassing the 145th St. station in both directions as police investigated.
Tags: new york assaults nypd
